mapper.insert: INSERT INTO materoom(MR_SPORTNAME,MR_AREA,MR_DATE,MR_CAPACITY, MR_DISCLOSUREYN, MATCHING_ROOMNO, MR_CREATEDATE, MR_TITLE, MR_CONTENT, MR_GENDER_LIMIT, MR_AGE_LIMIT_MIN, MR_AGE_LIMIT_Max, MR_MATCHINGYN ) VALUES(#{mateSport},#{mateArea}, #{mateDate}, #{mateCapacity}, #{rYN}, #{matchingRoom}, current_timestamp, #{mateTitle}, #{mateContent}, #{gLimit},#{ageMin},#{ageMax}, #{mYN})
INSERT INTO materoom_participants(mr_no, id, mrp_manager) VALUES(#{mateNo},#{id},'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT MR_NO FROM materoom_participants WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT MR.*, MP.id AS manager FROM materoom MR LEFT JOIN materoom_participants MP ON MR.MR_NO = MP.MR_NO AND MP.MRP_MANAGER = 'Y' where MR_DISCLOSUREYN = 'Y'
SELECT m.name, m.GENDER, m.B_DAY, p.PRO_FILEPATH from member m join profile p on m.id=p.id where m.id = #{id}
SELECT m.MRP_NO, m.ID, m.MR_NO,m.MRP_MANAGER, p.PRO_FILEPATH from materoom_participants m join profile p on m.id=p.id where m.MR_NO = #{challNo} ORDER BY MRP_NO DESC
SELECT MR.* , MP.id AS manager FROM materoom MR JOIN materoom_participants MP ON MR.MR_NO = MP.MR_NO AND MP.MRP_MANAGER = 'Y' where MP.MR_NO = #{challNo}
SELECT id FROM (SELECT id, MRP_NO FROM materoom_participants WHERE MR_NO = #{challNo} ORDER BY MRP_NO ASC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE materoom_participants SET MRP_MANAGER ='Y' WHERE id=#{manager}
UPDATE materoom SET MR_DISCLOSUREYN =#{open} WHERE MR_NO = #{mateNo}
mapper.select: SELECT MR_NO FROM ( SELECT MR_NO FROM matching_status WHERE MS_SPORTS = #{mateSport} and MS_AREA=#{mateArea} and MS_DATE = #{mateDate} and MS_PEOPLE = #{mateCapacity} ORDER BY MS_NO ASC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE materoom SET MATCHING_ROOMNO =#{myRoom} WHERE MR_NO=#{room}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matching_status(mr_no, MR_SPORTNAME,MR_AREA, MR_DATE, MR_CAPACITY) VALUES(#{mateNo},#{mateSport},#{mateArea},#{mateDate},#{mateCapacity})
